title: Going to Service for Service Pt1
memoryVerse: The Lord is my shephard I shall not want
meaning: Going to service is attending service, attending bible study, prayer meetings and all set prgrams by which God who oversees everybody has created through His underlay shepherd

body.header: Department and area of Divine Service

list: Why do we go to service, we come to service to service out heart
